Text:
!!!!  Don't DL !!!!  
This copy is zoomed & cropped & looks like shit!  It's so bad it's impossible to watch.  Whoever records {C_P}'s vids doesn't know how to set up thier pvr &/or conversion software.  It's the exact same with the new Thundercats 2011 ep.  Last weeks eps were just as fucked as this one.
{C_P} claims that these are a week ahead of schedule; but he is just showing his ignorance as they are released the same day they air on CN.  I'll be sure to avoid any {C_P} vids from now on!
check Wikipedia' episode listings:  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Green_Lantern:_The_Animated_Series_episodes
Agreed, hate to hate on an uploader but it's terrible and grainy.

Welcome to another "quality" C_P release -- flood-filling torrent-land with pure shit for a decade.

* STOP downloading ancient XviD garbage
* STOP download C_P
Mike Go Fuck yourself! You don't need to be here...
